thread.section_title: CheapOair.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CheapOair.com | www.cheapoair.com | 3 of 243
thread.title: Cheryl

author: Cheryl
title: Cheryl
text: To make a long story short, I booked on line for a return flight home, but I booked it from Vancouver instead of Anchorage and didn't notice it for a couple weeks. Called CheapOair the agent cancelled one and rebooked us on the correct flight. No hassle at all, just the $200. per ticket for my major screw-up. When I got my credit card statement everything was straightened out.
